name: Terry Ogle
text: Excellent pizza, great service. Can eat inside or outside! Brewed tea!

name: Lisa Pollice
text: The pie is ok... but the service here has gone downhill precipitously.   All three people with whom I interacted here - didn't bother to look up, mumbled "what'd ya want on your pizza" or flat out didn't answer when I asked questions.  When ‚Ä¶More

name: Erin P
text: The highlights are building a custom pizza from scratch and the allergy friendly pizza crusts like the gluten free option. Ingredients are selected much like the set up in Chipotle or Subway. The food is tasty although my last pizza could ‚Ä¶More

name: Melvin Mian
text: Was visiting for a job interview here and looking for somewhere to eat. I stopped in and was greeted by some great staff. They were super nice, specifically a young man, (I forgot his name, maybe Mike?). Super nice guy and made the pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Adam Brown
text: I was expecting less but go so much more. Great value ($7.69 for 11" pizza... unlimited toppings!). It was easy, fun, and delicious. We'll go back for sure!

name: DeAnthony Frost
text: First time visiting pie five today. Just had a long day at work and really wanted pizza, The customer service was great with nice small talk while they prepare the pizza, my pizza and salad was done in no time. Made my day better. Thanks guys.

name: Viktoria De'Vonne
text: I love this place.  I get a different pizza every time I go to Pie Five.  We went twice in one week!  We had the amazing Kitt!!!  Unfortunately when we went back the second time that week, we got the manager and she wasn't as great....  üò™

name: A≈ÉG FREINER
text: Order to perfection. Great tea. Fast service. Not so healthy but you only live once.

name: Terry Ogle
text: Great tasting pizza!

name: Matt King
text: Monday deal is the BEST!

name: Tammi W
text: Delicious every time! Staff are always very pleasant. Great location!!

name: Jessica White
text: The food and service are always good here. I've never had a bad experience.

name: Mad Hatterr
text: They offer a lot of options including gluten free and cauliflower crust. Flavor and service is good.

name: Aristote G-Atata
text: Staff is young and dynamic! However, management should think about updating the drinks fountain. A coca cola freestyle machine would be perfect. Most of other pie five places in kansas have one.

name: Aaron Connor
text: My family and I really like this place. On Sundays they have a kids eat free deal. It's perfect for us. My wife and I eat vegan and they carry vegan cheese. My oldest son and his girlfriend are vegan as well. The rest of my kids like ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashlee Massai
text: As a vegan, it's pretty disconcerting and frustrating to be charged EXTRA for a cheese alternative... And then they want to be stingy with adding cheese!! Unbelievable.. ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Ryan Boyce
text: Love it. Build your own pizza with all fresh ingredients. It's setup kinda like a subawy so you watch your food be made right I front of you.

name: Daniel Smith
text: What a cool place. Why not have a "Subwayesk" pizza place.  Pick your crust, sauce and toppings.  All made right before your very eyes.  The choices were plentiful and fresh.  AND done in 5 minutes!!  The staff members were friendly, fast ‚Ä¶More

name: Marek Marcinkowski
text: The pizza here was great! Decided to stop by because I get them from Ubereats all the time. It was worth it. I would recommend them anytime! The staff here was very friendly.

name: Christinia Williams
text: Always good. Friendly staff. Great food.

name: Whitney Jones
text: Really good pizza, really fast! Great price and it's custom ordered!

name: parker bender
text: Impressed.  Had the coliflower crust, and it was spendy buy real nice!

name: Theresa Johnson
text: Love picking my own fresh ingredients and the magic dust!

name: Emalee Ridgway
text: My past experiences with Pie Five were amazing.  The quality of the ingredients was above what I was expecting and the service was great the first time. I was expecting the same quality when I took my sister here today, but I didn't have ‚Ä¶More

name: Brandon Boatright
text: Staff are super friendly and do a great job all around.

text: Great food. Casual atmosphere.

name: Nick Will
text: great toppings

name: Kevin Pate
text:
Very good customer service and quite a novel idea. Like a Chipotle but with pizza.
Plenty of toppings to choose from and 3 different crusts. I went with a reg. crust with sausage, green olive, and some peppers and I was not disappointed.

name: Derwin Norton
text: I love their Pizza it's like going to Subway but you getting a pizza made your way

name: J K
text: This was the absolute best pizza i've had in a very long time. (And i eat pizza at least once a week + eating leftovers at least 1 more day)

name: Will Hargrave
text: Food was decent. Make sure you order ahead of time and pick it up instead of waiting for the people there to make it and cut it as they are very slow and the people who online order will be taken care of at the register while you stand and wait with your food.

name: Robert Bennett
text: I have been here a bunch over the last few months, and slow watched this place decline. I'd some it up like this: Staff very rude, she was in such a hurry that she messed my order up right off the start, and here's the kicker there was no ‚Ä¶More

name: Aimee Anderson
text: We had great service and the food was good!

name: Angela Krout
text: Running late, buzzed in for a quick lunch. EXCELLENT food.

name: Jeannae Segura Brown
text: We love the califlower crust. Nobody else has it!

name: nikia maltbia
text: Great place for fast gluten free pizza!

name: Chris Wheelhouse
text: This is a great idea for a pizza place.  My whole family can get their own pizza.  They are very gluten free friendly

name: April Al-Mahdawi
text: My new favorite pizza place! The staff is very nice and my kids love choosing their own pizza toppings.

name: Michael Dean
text: I like how they have different choices for crust. Other places normally skimp on crust

name: Evan Kirsch
text: You can count on the service and the pizza being the same every time.  Employees ask you if everything looks good prior to baking each one.  Serving size will fill you up even though each pizza is four slices.

name: Tricia Rojo Bushnell
text: These folks do gluten free right. When the servers know to change their gloves and have a whole different set of pans and utensils, you can feel much safer.

name: Marie Gail Stratford
text: Fantastic made-to-order pizza at prices that can't be beat. Employees at this location are always cheerful and helpful.

name: Aaron Crossley
text: Food is good. But service is slooooooow. Not a great place to grab a quick lunch.

name: Shanita Porter
text: Great pizza!

name: Caleb Sommerville
text: Great custom pizzas. The spicy marinara sauce is delightful. Don't eat the pizza right away, though. It's super hot.

name: Brian
text: Great pizza and laid back atmosphere

text: Yummy pizza for sure. Love how they have Alfredo sauce cause that's me favvvv üçï. However, I would have liked if they put more toppings on the pizza üòù

text:
Excellent customer service

name: Garret Cochran
text: fresh made in front of you,  will not take "large Bills"  which is a pain,  our meal cost over $60 and they wouldn't take anything larger then a 20, which only had two, so had to pay with credit card.  something about people passing fake bills,  hard to fake one of the new 100s

text: Pizza was soggy and they didn't make my desert pizza that I ordered by the time it was time for me to pay so I left.... without my dessert....was on a 30 minute lunch break.

text:
Decent pizza. Nothing to write home about.

text: This location was a little slower than others, but the food was delicious and I will be returning. Parking can be a nightmare in this area
